attributes.action: Stop intruding in the lives of the Citizens of this country with its increasing strategies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are becoming more and more alarmed that our personal liberties are constantly being eroded by the present government.  There is the Road Pricing Strategy, the introducion of inspectors to inspector every home in the country for re-pricing, the introduction of new layers in the Health Service with more people having access to our details, "wheelie" bin pricing etc.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/revaluation/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
